title: Combat Basics
description: Practice equipping gear, firing, and dodging attacks.

default: Press I to open your inventory, then select the blaster to equip it.

hints: Tap I to reopen the inventory panel.
You're ready to fight—close the inventory to continue.

default: Hold right mouse to aim, then left mouse to fire.

hints: Pause your aim for a moment before shooting to tighten the spread.
Reload with R to replenish your magazine.

steps.text: Evade the incoming attack to survive.
objectives: Dash out of the danger zone.

default: Double-tap a movement key to perform a quick dodge.

hints: Move as soon as you see the red warning circle appear.
Keep moving—dodges travel farther when you have momentum.

completion.summary: You can now take on the first mission.
